messages.content: From home but we are fully registered and have every health and safety and food certificate under our belt
Is this done from ur home or is it a commercial building?
Ok

Itâs traditional peppercorn sauce made with 4 different peppercorns and whisky 

Veggie sauce is a peppercorn sauce but completely meat and alcohol free
I could have some of them asap lol 15 balls looks very reasonable. What sauce is it?
Yeah Glasgow live is bollox hahaha I'll have a look ð
We also have an article on Glasgow Live here - https://www.glasgowlive.co.uk/whats-on/haggis-house-launches-serve-up-20085166

Some more info about us: 

My dad is an award winning executive head chef with over 25 years in the business! And I am his food fanatic daughter and we have come together to create The Haggis House. 

We order the Haggis from my dads good friend who has his own farm and is a meat supplier. We then hand roll every ball and cut every fritter and breadcrumb and fry them as well as make our own home made sauces. 

We sell the best haggis fritters and balls from our home in the southside of Glasgow! You canât get our haggis in any super marker or store! We offer:

ð 4x Fritters + Pc Sauce = Â£4 
ð 4x Veg Fritters + Veg Pc Sauce = Â£4
ð 15x Balls + Pc Sauce = Â£5 
â EXTRA SAUCE POT = Â£1.50

For just now collection only- to order - send us a message anytime! Message us what yer wantin tae order and what time you are available to collect it over the weekend. Pick up from us at G44 on Sat or Sun! Exact address will be given when you order.

Sophie x
Do u post overseas?
I'll have a look

We donât actually do pakora but we are looking to expand! 

Because we are brand new just now we have just been testing the waters with customers and orders ... 

We do haggis balls and haggis fritters with traditional whiskey and peppercorn sauce , as well as veggie haggis and a veggie alcohol free peppercorn sauce. our offers and prices are on our insta page :)
